intro: Enjoy 3 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!
description:
This pack includes the games:

Speedway Racing
Grand Prix Rock ´N Racing
Hypercar Racing

In Speedway Racing, you will enjoy the fastest, most spectacular races at over 350 Km/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 12 rivals.
There are several modes available, including Championship, Arcade and 4-player multiplayer.

Grand Prix Rock 'N Racing gives you the fastest, most exciting races. You can evolve your car, improving the engine, brakes, tires and more until you've achieved the perfect evolution to win the Championship!

In Hypercar Racing you'll enjoy the dirtiest, fastest, and most spectacular races at speeds over 200 Mp/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 8 adversaries. The game has different modes, such as Championship, Arcade, and 4-player multiplayer.

Features:

- Wide variety of tracks.
- Multi-player with 4 players.
- Races with 12 opponents.
- Realistic driving physics.
- Lots of Rock 'N Roll music.
